name: bar123-history-sync-extension
description: Safari extension for P2P history synchronization

scripts.build: npm run bundle-peerjs && npm run copy-assets
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.test-ui: npm run build && xcodebuild test -project bar123.xcodeproj -scheme bar123UITests -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15'
scripts.test-full: npm run test-integration && npm run test
scripts.ios-build-testflight: npm run prepare-profiles && npm run ios-build -- --upload --apple-id $APPLE_ID --app-password $APP_SPECIFIC_PASSWORD
scripts.ios-build-local: npm run prepare-profiles && npm run ios-build

author: History Sync Extension
